Description: "LOBBY ID" is a unique code that is generated for each lobby, that players in the lobby can share to invite other players to their lobby. "Clipboard" refers to the Windows clipboard, i.e. the place where text and media ends up when you use [ctrl]+C.

French.Translation: COPIER L'ID DE SALON DANS LE PRESSE-PAPIERS

Spanish.Translation: COPIAR ID. DE SALA AL PORTAPAPELES

Portuguese_Brazil.Translation: COPIAR ID DE LOBBY PARA ÁREA DE TRANSFERÊNCIA

Japanese.Translation: ロビーIDをクリップボードにコピー

name: MainMenu.Lobby.CopyLobbyIdToClipboard
